# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/xmpp__connection`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for @xmpp/connection (https://github.com/xmppjs/xmpp.js/tree/main/packages/connection).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/xmpp__connection.
